presentationColumns.name: Invoices Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount excluding the Credit Memo, Credit Memo Request and Debit Memo invoice type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Invoices Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Invoices Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count excluding the Credit Memo, Credit Memo Request and Debit Memo invoice type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Invoices Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Invoices Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Invoices Amount / Invoices Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Avg Invoices Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Credit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount for the Credit Memo and Credit Memo Request invoice type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Credit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Credit Memos Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count for Credit Memo and Credit Memo Request invoice type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Credit Memos Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Credit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Credit Memos Amount / Credit Memos Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Avg Credit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoice amount for the Debit Memo invoice type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Debit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Debit Memos Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the invoices count for Debit Memo invoice type.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Debit Memos Count

presentationColumns.name: Avg Debit Memos Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Debit Memos Amount / Debit Memos Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Avg Debit Memos Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Transaction Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of Invoices Amount, Debit Memos Amount and Credit Memos Amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Total Transaction Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Total Transaction Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the sum of Invoices Count, Debit Memos Count and Credit Memos Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Total Transaction Count

presentationColumns.name: Credit Memos To Invoices Amount %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Credit Memos Amount / Invoices Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Credit Memos To Invoices Amount % in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Discount Offered Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the discount offered amount for all transactions.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Invoice Schedules.Discount Offered Amount in Document Currency

presentationColumns.name: Discount Offered %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Discount Offered Amount / Total Transaction Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AP Compound.Discount Offered % in Document Currency
